values_subtitle: We believe in a set of core values that guide our work and reflect our commitment to our clients
about_description: Business Hub is a leading center for business incubation and acceleration in Saudi Arabia. We provide a supportive and comprehensive environment for entrepreneurs and startups, helping them turn ideas into successful and sustainable projects.
about_feature2_desc: Elite group of experts and consultants
about_feature4_desc: From idea to success and expansion
mission_missionText: Empowering entrepreneurs and startups to turn their ideas into successful, sustainable projects by providing a comprehensive, incubating environment that combines expertise, innovation, and continuous support.
mission_visionText: To be the number one platform for business incubation and acceleration in Saudi Arabia and the region, contributing to a prosperous economy based on innovation and entrepreneurship.
mission_objective3: Achieve a market value exceeding 2 billion SAR
mission_objective4: Build a network of 100+ strategic partners

iso_hero_subtitle: We help you achieve global ISO certifications to boost your business quality and efficiency

iso_importance_companies_desc: Enhance operational efficiency, customer satisfaction, and gain a competitive edge
iso_importance_institutions_desc: Boost credibility, improve management, and comply with international standards

ceo.name: Yousef Al-Baladi
ceo.title: Company CEO
ceo.quote: Welcome to the Business Hub, where we believe in the power of individuals, ideas, and institutions to lead with innovation, excellence, and purpose. Our mission is simple yet profound – transforming potential into progress. From startups to established companies, we connect ambition with opportunity through mentorship, incubation, acceleration, and empowerment. We pride ourselves on building ecosystems that enable growth and collaboration at every stage of the entrepreneurial journey. Our work extends to co-working spaces, training programs, and national initiatives that translate vision into measurable impact. We firmly believe in the leadership potential of Saudi Arabia and are committed to shaping an economy that not only competes globally but also leads. Yousef Albaladi, CEO, Business Hub
ceo.bio: A visionary leader with over 15 years’ experience supporting and empowering startups. Under his leadership, Business Hub helped more than 500 projects to grow and thrive.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: We are committed to protecting your privacy and the security of your personal information

sections.title: Information Collection
sections.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us when registering or using our services, including name, email, phone number, and information related to your project. We also automatically collect information about your use of the site such as IP address, browser type, and browsing history to improve your experience.

sections.title: Use of Information
sections.content: We use the collected information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you about our programs and events, process your requests and transactions, and personalize your experience on our platform. We may also use the information for analytical purposes and developing new services that meet your needs.

sections.title: Information Protection
sections.content: We take strict security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or misuse. We use advanced encryption technologies, firewalls, and continuous monitoring systems. Your data is stored on secure servers and accessed only by authorized personnel.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted partners who help us provide our services, or when legally required. All third parties are obligated to protect your information and maintain its confidentiality according to the highest standards.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access your personal information, request its correction or deletion, object to its processing, and request data portability. You can also withdraw your consent to data processing at any time. To exercise any of these rights, please contact us through available communication channels.

sections.title: Cookies
sections.content: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our site, remember your preferences, and analyze site usage. You can control cookie settings through your browser, but disabling them may affect some site functionalities.

cta.title: Have Privacy Questions?
cta.description: We are here to answer all your questions about how we protect your data

refund.title: Refund & Return Policy
refund.subtitle: Terms and procedures for payment refunds and cancellations

eligible.title: Refund Eligible Cases
items: Service cancellation at least 7 days before start
Failure to deliver the agreed service
Technical issues from our side preventing service use

nonEligible.title: Non-Refundable Cases
items: Non-compliance with service terms and conditions
Customized services that have been completed
Cancellation within 48 hours of service start

steps.title: Submit Request
steps.description: Submit refund request via contact form or email with transaction number

steps.title: Review
steps.description: Your request will be reviewed within 3-5 business days and verified against conditions

steps.title: Approval
steps.description: You will be notified of approval or rejection with reasons provided

steps.title: Refund
steps.description: Amount will be refunded within 7-14 business days to original payment method

partialRefunds.title: Partial Refund Rates
partialRefunds.subtitle: Refund percentage depends on timing of cancellation request

rates.condition: Cancellation after start or same day

notes.title: Important Notes
items: Refund will be issued to the same payment method used for original payment
Refund process may take 7-14 business days depending on bank
For partial refunds, a 5% administrative fee will be deducted
For full refund, request must be made at least 7 days before service start

cta.title: Need Help?
cta.description: Our customer service team is ready to help you with the refund process

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services

sections.title: General Terms
sections.content: Welcome to Business Hub. By using our services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using any of our services. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, and you will be notified of any material changes.

sections.title: User Rights and Obligations
sections.content: As a user of our services, you have the right to access all available resources and programs. You must provide accurate and complete information when registering and maintain the confidentiality of your account data. Using our services for any illegal or unethical purposes is prohibited. We reserve the right to suspend or cancel your account in case of violation of these terms.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
sections.content: All content and materials available on our platform, including texts, images, logos, and software, are protected under intellectual property laws. No content may be copied, distributed, or modified without prior written permission from Business Hub. Business Hub retains all intellectual property rights to the provided content.

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content: Our services are provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. Business Hub is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages that may result from the use or inability to use our services. We make every effort to ensure the accuracy of the information provided, but we do not guarantee that it is error-free. The user bears full responsibility for decisions made based on the information provided.

categories.title: Fees and Payment
points: All fees are stated in Saudi Riyals and include VAT
Payment is required in advance before service commencement
Fees are non-refundable except in exceptional cases according to the refund policy
We reserve the right to modify prices with prior notice

categories.title: Service Termination
points: Either party may terminate the service with 30 days prior notice
We reserve the right to terminate the service immediately in case of violation of terms
Upon service termination, all financial obligations must be settled
Data is retained for 90 days after service termination

categories.title: Governing Law
points: These terms are governed by the laws of Saudi Arabia
Any disputes are resolved through competent courts in Madinah
Arabic is the official language for contracts and agreements
In case of conflict between Arabic and English versions, the Arabic version prevails

reviews.title: What Our Clients Say
reviews.subtitle: Success stories from entrepreneurs and companies we supported in their journey

items.name: Fatima Ali
items.review: Very professional and supportive team. I got everything I needed to successfully launch my project. Highly recommend them to every entrepreneur.

items.name: Khaled Al-Saeed
items.review: Amazing experience! The incubator environment and technical and advisory support helped me overcome challenges and achieve my goals.

items.name: Sarah Abdullah
items.review: Thanks to Business Hub for the continuous support. I obtained the ISO certificate thanks to their excellent and professional assistance.

items.name: Mohammed Al-Harthi
items.review: The services provided by Business Hub are excellent and professional. They helped me build a strong business plan and secure the necessary funding.
